entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of rain mixed with snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 100 near noon then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
